verses.verse: וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> dwelt שָׂרֵֽי־ <WH8269> And the rulers הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> the rest הָ֠עָם <WH5971> of the people הִפִּ֨ילוּ <WH5307> also cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <WH1486> lots לְהָבִ֣יא ׀ <WH935> to bring אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> one מִן־ <WH4480> out הָעֲשָׂרָ֗ה <WH6235> of ten לָשֶׁ֙בֶת֙ <WH3427> to dwell בִּֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> in Jerusalem עִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy וְתֵ֥שַׁע <WH8672> and nine הַיָּד֖וֹת <WH3027> parts בֶּעָרִֽים׃ <WH5892> [to dwell] in [other] cities

וַֽיְבָרֲכ֖וּ <WH1288> blessed הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> And the people לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men הַמִּֽתְנַדְּבִ֔ים <WH5068> that willingly offered לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> themselves to dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> at Jerusalem פ

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> Now these [are] the chief הַמְּדִינָ֔ה <WH4082> of the province אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> that dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וּבְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> but in the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah יָֽשְׁב֞וּ <WH3427> dwelt אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one בַּאֲחֻזָּתוֹ֙ <WH272> in his possession בְּעָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5892> in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> [to wit] Israel הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <WH3881> and the Levites וְהַנְּתִינִ֔ים <WH5411> and the Nethinims וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> and the children עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> servants שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> of Solomon's

וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> And at Jerusalem יָֽשְׁב֔וּ <WH3427> dwelt מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [certain] of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Of the children יְ֠הוּדָה <WH3063> of Judah עֲתָיָ֨ה <WH6265> Athaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עֻזִּיָּ֜ה <WH5818> of Uzziah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זְכַרְיָ֧ה <WH2148> of Zechariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמַרְיָ֛ה <WH568> of Amariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁפַטְיָ֥ה <WH8203> of Shephatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַהֲלַלְאֵ֖ל <WH4111> of Mahalaleel מִבְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children פָֽרֶץ׃ <WH6557> of Perez

וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֣ה <WH4641> And Maaseiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1263> of Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כָּל־ חֹ֠זֶה <WH3626> of Colhozeh בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲזָיָ֨ה <WH2382> of Hazaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עֲדָיָ֧ה <WH5718> of Adaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹיָרִ֛יב <WH3114> of Joiarib בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זְכַרְיָ֖ה <WH2148> of Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַשִּׁלֹנִֽי׃ <WH8023> of Shiloni

כָּל־ <WH3605> All בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> All the sons פֶ֕רֶץ <WH6557> of Perez הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> that dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> [were] four מֵא֛וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> threescore וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <WH8083> and eight אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> men חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> valiant ס

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> now these בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And these [are] the sons בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin סַלֻּ֡א <WH5543> Sallu בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֡ם <WH4918> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹעֵ֡ד <WH3133> of Joed בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּדָיָה֩ <WH6305> of Pedaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son ק֨וֹלָיָ֧ה <WH6964> of Kolaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַעֲשֵׂיָ֛ה <WH4641> of Maaseiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִֽיתִיאֵ֖ל <WH384> of Ithiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְשַֽׁעְיָֽה׃ <WH3470> of Jesaiah
וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> And after גַּבַּ֣י <WH1373> him Gabbai סַלָּ֑י <WH5543> Sallai תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight

וְיוֹאֵ֥ל <WH3100> And Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> of Zichri פָּקִ֣יד <WH6496> [was] their overseer עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> command וִיהוּדָ֧ה <WH3063> and Judah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son הַסְּנוּאָ֛ה <WH5574> of Senuah עַל־ <WH5921> command הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> over the city מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <WH4932> [was] second פ
מִן־ <WH4480> From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> Of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <WH3048> Jedaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹיָרִ֖יב <WH3114> of Joiarib יָכִֽין׃ <WH3199> Jachin

שְׂרָיָ֨ה <WH8304> Seraiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <WH2518> of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <WH4918> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צָד֗וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <WH4812> of Meraioth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <WH285> of Ahitub נְגִ֖ד <WH5057> [was] the ruler בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <WH251> And their brethren עֹשֵׂ֤י <WH6213> that did הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <WH4399> the work לַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> [were] eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> and two וַ֠עֲדָיָה <WH5718> and Adaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֤ם <WH3395> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פְּלַלְיָה֙ <WH6421> of Pelaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַמְצִ֣י <WH557> of Amzi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son זְכַרְיָ֔ה <WH2148> of Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <WH6583> of Pashur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <WH4441> of Malchiah

וְאֶחָיו֙ <WH251> And his brethren רָאשִׁ֣ים <WH7218> chief לְאָב֔וֹת <WH1> of the fathers מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two וַעֲמַשְׁסַ֧י <WH6023> and Amashai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲזַרְאֵ֛ל <WH5832> of Azareel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַחְזַ֥י <WH273> of Ahasai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשִׁלֵּמ֖וֹת <WH4919> of Meshillemoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <WH564> of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> And their brethren גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <WH1368> mighty men חַ֔יִל <WH2428> of valour מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <WH8083> and eight וּפָקִ֣יד <WH6496> and their overseer עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and זַבְדִּיאֵ֖ל <WH2068> [was] Zabdiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַגְּדוֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> of [one of] the great men ס

וּמִֽן־ <WH4480> now from הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> Also of the Levites שְׁמַעְיָ֧ה <WH8098> Shemaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <WH2815> of Hashub בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <WH5840> of Azrikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <WH2811> of Hashabiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בּוּנִּֽי׃ <WH1138> of Bunni

וְשַׁבְּתַ֨י <WH7678> And Shabbethai וְיוֹזָבָ֜ד <WH3107> and Jozabad עַל־ <WH5921> charge הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <WH4399> business הַחִֽיצֹנָה֙ <WH2435> [had] the oversight of the outward לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God מֵרָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> of the chief הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> of the Levites

וּמַתַּנְיָ֣ה <WH4983> And Mattaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מִ֠יכָה <WH4318> Micah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זַבְדִּ֨י <WH2067> of Zabdi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָסָ֜ף <WH623> of Asaph רֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> [was] the principal הַתְּחִלָּה֙ <WH8462> to begin יְהוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> the thanksgiving לַתְּפִלָּ֔ה <WH8605> in prayer וּבַקְבֻּקְיָ֖ה <WH1229> and Bakbukiah מִשְׁנֶ֣ה <WH4932> the second מֵאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> among his brethren וְעַבְדָּא֙ <WH5653> and Abda בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁמּ֔וּעַ <WH8051> of Shammua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גָּלָ֖ל <WH1559> of Galal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son [יְדִיתוּן כ] (יְדוּתֽוּן׃ <WH3038> Jeduthun ק)

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> All the Levites בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> [were] two hundred שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> fourscore וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four פ

וְהַשּֽׁוֹעֲרִים֙ <WH7778> Moreover the porters עַקּ֣וּב <WH6126> Akkub טַלְמ֔וֹן <WH2929> Talmon וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> and their brethren הַשֹּׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> that kept בַּשְּׁעָרִ֑ים <WH8179> the gates מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> [were] an hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two

וּשְׁאָ֨ר <WH7605> And the residue יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> of the priests הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> [and] the Levites בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> [were] in all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> in his inheritance

וְהַנְּתִינִ֖ים <WH5411> But the Nethinims יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> dwelt בָּעֹ֑פֶל <WH6077> in Ophel וְצִיחָ֥א <WH6727> and Ziha וְגִשְׁפָּ֖א <WH1658> and Gispa עַל־ <WH5921> charge הַנְּתִינִֽים׃ <WH5411> [were] over the Nethinims פ

וּפְקִ֤יד <WH6496> The overseer הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> also of the Levites בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem עֻזִּ֤י <WH5813> [was] Uzzi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בָּנִי֙ <WH1137> of Bani בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <WH2811> of Hashabiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַתַּנְיָ֖ה <WH4983> of Mattaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָ֑א <WH4316> of Micha מִבְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> Of the sons אָסָף֙ <WH623> of Asaph הַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <WH7891> the singers לְנֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> [were] over מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> the business בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִצְוַ֥ת <WH4687> commandment הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> For [it was] the king's עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> concerning וַאֲמָנָ֥ה <WH548> concerning them that a certain portion עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <WH7891> should be for the singers דְּבַר־ <WH1697> due י֥וֹם <WH3117> for every day בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> day

וּפְתַֽחְיָ֨ה <WH6611> And Pethahiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֵֽׁיזַבְאֵ֜ל <WH4898> of Meshezabeel מִבְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children זֶ֤רַח <WH2226> of Zerah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לְיַ֣ד <WH3027> hand הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [was] at the king's לְכָל־ <WH3605> all דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> in all matters לָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> concerning the people

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַחֲצֵרִ֖ים <WH2691> And for the villages בִּשְׂדֹתָ֑ם <WH7704> with their fields מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [some] of the children יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah יָֽשְׁב֞וּ <WH3427> dwelt בְּקִרְיַ֤ת הָֽאַרְבַּע֙ <WH7153> at Kirjatharba וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and [in] the villages וּבְדִיבֹן֙ <WH1769> thereof and at Dibon וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and [in] the villages וּבִֽיקַּבְצְאֵ֖ל <WH3343> thereof and at Jekabzeel וַחֲצֵרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2691> and [in] the villages
וּבְיֵשׁ֥וּעַ <WH3442> And at Jeshua וּבְמוֹלָדָ֖ה <WH4137> and at Moladah וּבְבֵ֥ית פָּֽלֶט׃ <WH1046> and at Bethphelet
וּבַחֲצַ֥ר שׁוּעָ֛ל <WH2705> And at Hazarshual וּבִבְאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> and at Beersheba וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> and [in] the villages
וּבְצִֽקְלַ֥ג <WH6860> And at Ziklag וּבִמְכֹנָ֖ה <WH4368> and at Mekonah וּבִבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> and in the villages
וּבְעֵ֥ין רִמּ֛וֹן <WH5884> And at Enrimmon וּבְצָרְעָ֖ה <WH6881> and at Zareah וּבְיַרְמֽוּת׃ <WH3412> and at Jarmuth

זָנֹ֤חַ <WH2182> Zanoah עֲדֻלָּם֙ <WH5725> Adullam וְחַצְרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2691> and [in] their villages לָכִישׁ֙ <WH3923> at Lachish וּשְׂדֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH7704> and the fields עֲזֵקָ֖ה <WH5825> thereof at Azekah וּבְנֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and [in] the villages וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <WH2583> thereof And they dwelt מִבְּאֵֽר־ שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> from Beersheba עַד־ <WH5704> far גֵּֽיא־ <WH1516> unto the valley הִנֹּֽם׃ <WH2011> of Hinnom

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> also of Benjamin מִגָּ֑בַע <WH1387> from Geba מִכְמָ֣שׂ <WH4363> [dwelt] at Michmash וְעַיָּ֔ה <WH5857> and Aija וּבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> and Bethel וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> and [in] their villages
עֲנָת֥וֹת <WH6068> [And] at Anathoth נֹ֖ב <WH5011> Nob עֲנָֽנְיָֽה׃ <WH6055> Ananiah
חָצ֥וֹר ׀ <WH2674> Hazor רָמָ֖ה <WH7414> Ramah גִּתָּֽיִם׃ <WH1664> Gittaim
